about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Discover the story and mission of Simple Decor

story.description1: Simple Decor was founded with the vision of creating products from natural materials, bringing aesthetic and practical value to modern life.
story.description2: We believe that minimalist design is not just a trend but a sustainable way of living, respecting nature and creating meaningful products.
story.description3: From the early days with a small workshop, we have now developed into an export business serving customers worldwide.

footer.companyDescription: Specializing in providing interior decoration products from natural materials, environmentally friendly. We are committed to bringing high quality products at reasonable prices.
